title: what happened to the swimmer that got up every morning and swam and one morning left his clothes on beach and never showed up again...I think he was a teacher here in New Hanover county...Happened in the last 2 years..
text:
Chuck Kuebler, who disappeared after heading for a swim at Wrigthsville Beach last summer, has not been found.



http://www.starnewsonline.com/news/20160807/celebration-of-life-for-chuck-kuebler-planned-monday
